  • Overview: The walk through of Level design which are divided into 5 divisions and searching for objective with added back story.

Story

Knight return to his home to meet his mother but he couldn't find her. he goes an adventure in search of her. Knight becomes surprised when he sees his mother as a statue.

Future story and mechanics development

He finds a solution to make her alive. The gameplay is based on melee and block mechanism.
